channel.title: Help plzz
channel.description: How can i make ::noclip avalible on my client?? i use a different client and i can noclip but if i use my servers client it dosent do anything! please what do i do in the client to make noclip work?

item.title: Help plzz
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

In your client.java within your client files, search for:

if(aString887.equals("::fpsoff"))

You will see this piece of code:

if(aString887.equals("::fpsoff")) aBoolean1156 = false;

Below that piece of code, you should have:

[code]if(aString887.equals("::noclip"))
{
for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++)
{
for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++)
{
for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++)
aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0;

                            }

                        }

                    }[/code]

If not, add it.

Read full topic
